post_message: America has been a nation that has always controlled events and yet today events control us. Why? Because leadership matters. It matters if we want to restore America's role in the world, find the political will to take on the entrenched special interests that continually stand in the way of fundamental change, reform entitlement spending at every level of government, and ensure that every child, no matter their zip code, has access to a quality education. So, today I am announcing the launch of the Leadership Matters for America PAC. The PAC's goal to get real leadership back in our country starts today. So, let's get to work! Join us at: @webpagelink
